TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlArrayItemAttributes extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，可指定要插入到数组返回的公共字段或公共读/写属性的派生的类型。The class allows you to specify the derived types that can be inserted into an array returned by a public field or public read/write property. 返回此类的实例属性的类。An instance of this class is returned by the property of the class. 类可重写的一套时可以插入到的数组的对象已应用。The class is used when overriding the set of objects that can be inserted into an array to which the has been applied. 对于所需的字段或属性接受每个新类型，创建并用若要向其中添加对象返回的集合属性。For each new type you want the field or property to accept, create an and use the to add the object to the collection returned by the property. 到，，指定包含该字段或属性，该对象的类型和字段或属性的名称。 the to an , that specifies the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 构造与之前，调用或方法。Construct an with the before calling the or method.
